name: Heartburn Boulevard
description:
If you can, play the downloadable. The webgl version is a bit slow.

Enter a noir-inspired world as dark and as evil as your small intestine. Emily Coli, a bacterium on the run, has a train to catch. The body she rode into seven days ago (on a nice caeser salad) has gone to seed,  and she's on her way to the stomach to get out before it's too late. She will face pools of gastric acid, trigger-happy white blood cells, and... her past: P.I. Luke O'cyte, an immune-compromised former cop  and former lover.

Platforming puzzles revolve around Emily's ability to split via mitosis. Her clones mirror her movement, which helps her short-circuit neurons to open doors, but may also get in her way.

Created for August's PIGSquad summer game jam with the themes "Edutainment" and "Ancient History".
